items.sentence: Tom looks like he\'s too tired to help us right now.
Tom is one of the most handsome men I\'ve ever seen.
How long does it take to fly from Boston to Chicago?
How much longer will I have to stay in the hospital?
I avoid crossing the street here if I am in a hurry.
I came here to stop Tom from doing something stupid.
Don\'t worry about Tom. He can take care of himself.
Don\'t you think we should at least give Tom a call?
During the day, there\'s a bus every thirty minutes.
Even though I spoke French, they didn\'t understand.
